name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs (DS)
name_original: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs (DS)
description:
Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs (DS) is a platformer game developed by Eurocom Entertainment Software. It was originally released in 2009. Activision Blizzard published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs (DS) has a score of 67.
You can play Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs (DS) on Nintendo DS. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop.
